thread.title: Chris, Gemma and Shella (our best friend)
thread.title_full: Barking Mad Dog Care reviewed by Chris, Gemma and Shella (our best friend)

author: Chris, Gemma and Shella (our best friend)
title: Chris, Gemma and Shella (our best friend)
text: Shella had the best time in her holiday with Pat from barking mad, we will highly recommend them to all our dog owning friends and anyone who reads this, if your dog doesn't like kennels or you just don't want to take them to one, give barking mad a try you will find they take much better care of your best friend
